fields.text: Welcome to Vaco East Bay, your trusted partner for expert recruiting services.
If you are an employer seeking qualified candidates, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a permanent placement specialist.
For contract and temporary staffing services, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our contract staffing team.
If you are a job seeker looking for opportunities, press [INDEX].
To explore current job openings, press [INDEX].

To speak with a career advisor, press [INDEX].
